An effective communicator with excellent interpersonal, logical thinking and analytical abilities. AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 7 years as a software developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with ASP.NET, NodeJS, MongoDB and MS SQL. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.

My skills also include implementing system improvements like server upgrades, optimizing legacy applications, optimizing sites and improving the security aspect of websites, standardizing patterns, suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
